android.car.telemetry

类 CarTelemetryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.telemetry.CarTelemetryManager

  • public final class CarTelemetryManager
extends CarManagerBase
    Provides an application interface for interacting with the Car Telemetry Service.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  CarTelemetryManager.AddMetricsConfigCallback
      Application must pass a CarTelemetryManager.AddMetricsConfigCallback to use addMetricsConfig(String, byte[], Executor, AddMetricsConfigCallback)
      static interface  CarTelemetryManager.MetricsConfigStatus 
      static interface  CarTelemetryManager.MetricsReportCallback
      Application must pass a CarTelemetryManager.MetricsReportCallback object to receive finished reports from getFinishedReport(String, Executor, MetricsReportCallback) and getAllFinishedReports(Executor, MetricsReportCallback).
      static interface  CarTelemetryManager.MetricsReportStatus 
      static interface  CarTelemetryManager.ReportReadyListener
      Application can optionally use setReportReadyListener(Executor, ReportReadyListener) to receive report ready notifications.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int STATUS_ADD_METRICS_CONFIG_ALREADY_EXISTS
      Status to indicate that add MetricsConfig failed because the same MetricsConfig of the same name and version already exists.
      static int STATUS_ADD_METRICS_CONFIG_PARSE_FAILED
      Status to indicate that add MetricsConfig failed because CarTelemetryService is unable to parse the given byte array into a MetricsConfig.
      static int STATUS_ADD_METRICS_CONFIG_SIGNATURE_VERIFICATION_FAILED
      Status to indicate that add MetricsConfig failed because of failure to verify the signature of the MetricsConfig.
      static int STATUS_ADD_METRICS_CONFIG_SUCCEEDED
      Status to indicate that MetricsConfig was added successfully.
      static int STATUS_ADD_METRICS_CONFIG_UNKNOWN
      Status to indicate that add MetricsConfig failed because of a general error in cars.
      static int STATUS_ADD_METRICS_CONFIG_VERSION_TOO_OLD
      Status to indicate that add MetricsConfig failed because a newer version of the MetricsConfig exists.
      static int STATUS_GET_METRICS_CONFIG_DOES_NOT_EXIST
      Status to indicate a MetricsConfig does not exist and hence no report can be found.
      static int STATUS_GET_METRICS_CONFIG_FINISHED
      Status to indicate that MetricsConfig produced a report.
      static int STATUS_GET_METRICS_CONFIG_INTERIM_RESULTS
      Status to indicate a MetricsConfig exists and produced interim results.
      static int STATUS_GET_METRICS_CONFIG_PENDING
      Status to indicate a MetricsConfig exists but has produced neither interim/final report nor runtime execution errors.
      static int STATUS_GET_METRICS_CONFIG_RUNTIME_ERROR
      Status to indicate the MetricsConfig produced a runtime execution error.

      • 从类继承的字段 android.car.CarManagerBase

        mCar

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CarTelemetryManager

        public CarTelemetryManager(Car car,
                           IBinder service)
        Gets an instance of CarTelemetryManager.

        CarTelemetryManager manages com.android.car.telemetry.CarTelemetryService and provides APIs so the client can use the car telemetry service.

        There is only one client to this manager, which is OEM's cloud application. It uses the APIs to send config to and receive data from CarTelemetryService.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • addMetricsConfig

        public void addMetricsConfig(java.lang.String metricsConfigName,
                             byte[] metricsConfig,
                             java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                             CarTelemetryManager.AddMetricsConfigCallback callback)
        Adds a MetricsConfig to CarTelemetryService. The size of the MetricsConfig cannot exceed a METRICS_CONFIG_MAX_SIZE_BYTES, otherwise an exception is thrown.

        The MetricsConfig will be uniquely identified by its name and version. If a MetricsConfig of the same name already exists in com.android.car.telemetry.CarTelemetryService, the config version will be compared. If the version is strictly higher, the existing MetricsConfig will be replaced by the new one. All legacy data will be cleared if replaced.

        Client should use getFinishedReport(String, Executor, MetricsReportCallback) to get the report before replacing a MetricsConfig.

        The status of this API is sent back asynchronously via CarTelemetryManager.AddMetricsConfigCallback.

        参数:
        metricsConfigName - name of the MetricsConfig, must match TelemetryProto.MetricsConfig#getName().
        metricsConfig - the serialized bytes of a MetricsConfig object.
        executor - The Executor on which the callback will be invoked.
        callback - A callback for receiving addMetricsConfig status codes.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the MetricsConfig size exceeds limit.

      • removeMetricsConfig

        public void removeMetricsConfig(java.lang.String metricsConfigName)
        Removes a MetricsConfig from com.android.car.telemetry.CarTelemetryService. This will also remove outputs produced by the MetricsConfig. If the MetricsConfig does not exist, nothing will be removed.
        参数:
        metricsConfigName - that identify the MetricsConfig.

      • removeAllMetricsConfigs

        public void removeAllMetricsConfigs()
        Removes all MetricsConfigs from com.android.car.telemetry.CarTelemetryService. This will also remove all MetricsConfig outputs.

      • getFinishedReport

        public void getFinishedReport(java.lang.String metricsConfigName,
                              java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                              CarTelemetryManager.MetricsReportCallback callback)
        Gets script execution reports of a MetricsConfig as from the com.android.car.telemetry.CarTelemetryService. This API is asynchronous and the report is sent back asynchronously via the CarTelemetryManager.MetricsReportCallback. This call is destructive. The returned report will be deleted from CarTelemetryService.
        参数:
        metricsConfigName - to identify the MetricsConfig.
        executor - The Executor on which the callback will be invoked.
        callback - A callback for receiving finished reports.

      • getAllFinishedReports

        public void getAllFinishedReports(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                  CarTelemetryManager.MetricsReportCallback callback)
        Gets all script execution reports from com.android.car.telemetry.CarTelemetryService asynchronously via the CarTelemetryManager.MetricsReportCallback. The callback will be invoked multiple times if there are multiple reports. This call is destructive. The returned reports will be deleted from CarTelemetryService.
        参数:
        executor - The Executor on which the callback will be invoked.
        callback - A callback for receiving finished reports.

      • setReportReadyListener

        public void setReportReadyListener(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                   CarTelemetryManager.ReportReadyListener listener)
        Registers a listener to receive report ready notifications. This is an optional feature that helps clients decide when is a good time to call getFinishedReport(String, Executor, MetricsReportCallback).

        When a listener is set, it will receive notifications for reports or errors that are already produced before the listener is registered.

        Clients who do not register a listener should use getFinishedReport(String, Executor, MetricsReportCallback) periodically to check for report.

        参数:
        executor - The Executor on which the callback will be invoked.
        listener - The listener to receive report ready notifications.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the listener is already set.

      • clearReportReadyListener

        public void clearReportReadyListener()
        Clears the listener for receiving telemetry report ready notifications.
